Author: Alexander Mamaev
Title: [ANN] [pre-ICO] ICO of a hardware product DIAMOND GUARD. Securing cryptocurrency
Body: DIAMOND GUARD WE MAKE CRYPTOWORLD A SAFE PLACE  WEBSITE |   WHITEPAPER |  TELEGRAM  http://s019.radikal.ru/i625/1711/30/1c2cefe37e73.png What is Diamond Guard?  With cryptocurrency thefts on the rise - and users’ anonymity routinely infringed upon – it is only natural that owners of digital assets feel increasingly concerned about their possessions. Diamond Guard is a personal device to protect your cryptocurrency, while also providing a safe interface for operations with it. The device can also be used as a VPN node to ensure user's anonymity and protect him or her from hacking attacks.    3 Things That Make Diamond Guard Special:  It is convenient to use Diamond Guard can be connected to other devices via Bluetooth and Wi-Fi. Our device supports a screen interface to visualize operations, including cryptocurrency transfers.  It is virtually invulnerable to identity thefts and hacking attacks Diamond Guard uses multifactor authentication system including hardware, digital and biometric mechanisms to protect owner’s assets. Additional controls also force user to press a special button on the device to confirm vital transactions or when accessing private keys.    It ensures user’s anonymity Diamond Guard allows owner to create decentralized VPN connection disguised as SSL/http traffic. Using VPN also guarantees user’s protection from man-in-the-middle attacks.    http://s018.radikal.ru/i519/1711/45/5a055df15d87.jpg  ICO DETAILS  We are planning to launch ICO in January. Find out about our latest news by subscribing to the newsletter on our website  FUNDS ALLOCATION  http://s019.radikal.ru/i618/1711/32/f85377fbc040.png  CROWDSALE DETAILS  On the Crowdsale stage we will use “GRDe” tokens created using Ethereum platform via smart contract. On the next stage we will launch Diamond Guard blockchain with “GRD” token, based on the Graphene technology. “GRDe” will later migrate to “GRD” in 1:1 proportion.  Number of GRD tokens issued: 40 000 000 Token Standard: ERC20 Additional emission: not provided Pre-ICO value: 1 ETH = 1 000 GRD Options for use: the GRD token is a digital asset that can be used to buy Diamond Guard devices or pay for VPN traffic   Purchase methods accepted: BTC and ETH  http://s019.radikal.ru/i612/1711/37/1696df0eb5da.jpg  FAQ  What will drive price formation after the ICO?  Diamond Guard token is a utility token but it will be used not only in our blockchain for internal processes. We are going to sell Diamond Guard devices only for GRD tokens. GRD tokens will also be used to pay for VPN traffic.  Where are you established as an entity?  We are registered in Singapore as “QUASAR SYSTEMS SG PTE. LTD.” , 16 Raffles Quay, #33-02, Hong Leong Building, Singapore 048581. In future we are planning to organize a spin-off in the same jurisdiction.  Is your product just at the idea stage?  No. We already realized some modules, used technologies from our core business and are implementing it in Diamond Guard.  How we will be sure about your actions after crowdsale?  To ensure the transparency of our team's activities after carrying out the crowdsale and increasing the confidence of the buyers of the "GRDe" tokens, we will adhere to the principle of publishing quarterly reports revealing information about work on the product. The auditor will be selected after the end of the crowdsale by voting among the holders of the "GRDe" tokens.  What do I need to do in order to join your pre-ICO?  As per KYC/AML requirements we announce Whitelist registration for our pre-ICO. Please submit the form below to participate in crowdsale. After that, we will send you our address for transaction.   Follow us on:  FACEBOOK | TWITTER |  MEDIUM

Author: Alexander Mamaev
Title: [ANN] [pre-ICO] ICO of a hardware product DIAMOND GUARD. Securing cryptocurrency
Body: We are pleased to announce that Diamond Guard has been approved by ICOBOX experts. That means it has been included into the platform's list of pre-ICO projects. To make our project better, we need your opinion.  If you find personal device for cryptocurrency protection developed by our team an appealing idea, please vote for Diamond Guard via this link - https://icos.icobox.io/projects/1586/    We would appreciate your feedback even if it is critical of our project. That way we can learn our mistakes and improve our product.  Sincerely yours, The Diamond Guard team
